comments.body:
Perhaps a helpful function for this if we are going to do across the codebase? Jeff's idea - [here](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/30521#issuecomment-569676489)

I'm happy to tackle some myself too :)
Go for it.  I think this is a strictly better pattern than `pytest.xfail`, since it will alert us if an xfail becomes fixed.
